name: 1-1 Big Bob-omb on the Summit
notes: Go to the mountaintop and talk to Big Bob-omb. Get behind him, pick him up and throw him onto the mountaintop three times. If you throw him off the mountain, he'll jump back up and scold you.

name: 1-2 Footrace with Koopa the Quick
notes: Talk to Koopa the Quick at the beginning, and he will challenge you to a race to where the Big Bob-omb was. Even though he takes a shortcut that Mario cannot, he will reach the top in a little over 1'30"00. Mario can run the race in about a minute, or use the flowerbed and cave warp zones for a 46-second finishing time. If you use the cannons at all, KtQ will say you cheated and you won't get the Star.

name: 1-3 Shoot to the Island in the Sky
notes: If you haven't already opened the cannons, do it now. Head past the first bridge, to the cannon in the gray half-pyramid. Line up the crosshairs with the corner of the floating island that is sticking out towards you, aim high, and fire! The Star is in the Yellow [!] Box on the island.

name: 1-4 Find the Eight Red Coins
notes: Get all 8 Red Coins. This should be fairly easy... don't forget the one on the floating island.

name: 1-5 Mario Wings to the Sky
notes: You need the Wing Cap to get this Star. Get on the floating island, and then get the Wing Cap there. Jump into the cannon, and aim for the coin in the middle of the circle of coins. When you shoot out of the cannon, don't steer Mario at all; a wind gust will push Mario into all five "special" coins.

name: 1-6 Behind Chain Chomp's Gate
notes: Three butt-stomps on Chain Chomp's wooden post will set him free. Before he hops off, he breaks open the cage, freeing the star.

name: 2-1 Chip Off Whomp's Block
notes: Climb to the top of the fortress to find the Whomp King. Stand in front of him and he'll try to fall on you. When he's flat on his face, butt-stomp his back. Three stomps will beat him, but try to stay on the top! If you go down too far off the edge, or you'll have to start the battle over.

name: 2-2 To the Top of the Fortress
notes: A tower has appeared where the Whomp King was. Make your way up the tower to find the Star.

name: 2-3 Shoot into the Wild Blue
notes: Launch yourself out of the cannon to the platform underneath the pole. Climb down the pole to the Star.

name: 2-4 Red Coins on the Floating Isle
notes: Get all 8 Red Coins. They are all easily accessible except for one above the second Thwomp.

name: 2-5 Fall onto the Caged Island
notes: Jump in the tree next to the starting point to find Hoot the Owl. Grab on and fly with him up and to the right. You'll see a small, caged floating platform containing the Star. Release your grip on Hoot and fall into the platform, or you can use the cannon to launch yourself into it.

name: 2-6 Blast Away the Wall
notes: While in the cannon, you'll see a corner sticking out, then some coins, and another corner. Launch yourself into the second corner, and it will break off, revealing the Star. Depending on your shot, you may have to go back up to get the Star.

name: 3-1 Plunder in the Sunken Ship
notes: Wait until the giant eel swims out of the ship, then swim into the ship where he was and unlock the 4 chests. The correct order is: chest farthest from you, chest on your right, chest closest to you, and chest on your left.

name: 3-2 Can the Eel Come out to Play?
notes: Swim next to the giant eel again. He will swim out; the star is on his tail.

name: 3-3 Treasure in the Ocean Cave
notes: Swim through the tunnel near the ship. You will surface in a cave. Open the 4 chests. The correct order is: chest farthest from you, chest on your left, chest on your right, chest closest to you.

name: 3-4 Red Coins on the Ship Afloat
notes: Get all 8 Red Coins.

name: 3-5 Blast to the Stone Pillar
notes: Launch yourself out of the cannon onto the leftmost spike that extends out of the water. You have to hit the top of the spike, or Mario will slide down. Climb to the top of the spike and jump onto the ledge with the star.

name: 3-6 Through the Jet Stream
notes: Get the Metal Cap and jump off the ledge into the water. Quickly run to the star underwater in the jet stream.

name: 4-1 Slip Slidin' Away
notes: Climb onto the house where you start and go down the chimney. Make it to the bottom of the slide to get the star. There is a shortcut on the right wall when it curves upward... just follow the string of coins into the wall.

name: 4-2 Li'l Penguin Lost
notes: Pick up the baby penguin that you see when you start and carry it all the way down to the mama penguin. Put it down next to her and she will give you a star.

name: 4-3 Big Penguin Race
notes: Go down the chimney again, and beat the big penguin to the end. If you use the shortcut, the penguin will say you cheated, and he won't give you the star.

name: 4-4 Frosty Slide for 8 Red Coins
notes: Get all 8 Red Coins.

name: 4-5 Snowman's Lost His Head
notes: Talk to the snowball at the TOP of the mountain. Beat it down the mountain and stand next to the snowball head. The rolling snowball will run into the head and create a snowman. Talk to him for the star.

name: 4-6 Wall Kicks Will Work
notes: Launch yourself out of the cannon at the tree. Follow the path and use the wall kick technique to reach the star.

name: 5-1 Go on a Ghost Hunt
notes: Kill all the Boos to make Big Boo appear in the center of the house. Pound him a few times to get a star.

name: 5-2 Ride Big Boo's Merry-Go-Round
notes: In the Merry-Go-Round, kill Boos until Big Boo appears. Pound him a few times to get a star.

name: 5-3 Secret of the Haunted Books
notes: Upstairs, in the room where the small books fly out at you, there are 3 books sticking out. Hit them in this order: top, right, left.

name: 5-4 Seek the 8 Red Coins
notes: Get all 8 Red Coins.

name: 5-5 Big Boo's Balcony
notes: Upstairs in the room on the far right, there is a platform up high that you need to jump to. Use the wall kick technique. Go through the double doors near the Blue Coin Box on the ground, and beat the Big Boo outside. The star will appear on the roof. To get the star, you can jump to either of the flat side ledges, then jump to the center ledge with the star. It's not easy.

name: 5-6 Eye to Eye in the Secret Room
notes: Get the Vanish Cap, then quickly go up to where the blue star box in the ground is (from Star 5). Instead of going outside, go through the ghost picture on the wall, and beat Mr. I. for the star.

name: 6-1 Swimming Beast in the Cavern
notes: On the middle of the island where Dorrie the Sea Dragon is. Run up onto her head, and steer her by moving the control stick.

name: 6-2 Elevate for 8 Red Coins
notes: Get all 8 Red Coins.

name: 6-3 Metal-Head Mario Can Move
notes: When you take the elevator down to Dorrie's area, get the Metal Cap, then quickly jump on the ! switch under the water. This will open the metal bars guarding the door in front of you. Go in. The star is across a chasm.

name: 6-4 Navigating the Toxic Maze
notes: Just before you drop down into the toxic gas area, there is a map on the wall. The down arrow is where you will start; the up arrow is where you can get out. The 3 blue circles are ledges that you can double jump and catch on. Jump up to the one corresponding to the second blue circle from left. The door there will take you up to the star.

name: 6-5 A-Maze-Ing Emergency Exit
notes: Same as star 4 except use the blue circle on the far left. You need to jump and travel across the grating to get the star, or just triple jump over to it. There is no door on the ledge corresponding to the blue circle on the right. An alternative method to find these ledges is to pound the Blue Coin Box on the ground and follow the Blue Coins.

name: 6-6 Watch for Falling Rocks
notes: Stand under the place where the giant boulders fall down. Look up and towards the door; the star is on the ledge. You can use the wall kick technique to get there.

name: 7-1 Boil the Big Bully
notes: Knock the Big Bully into the lava. The best way to do this is to stand on the edge and let him run towards you. When he gets close, pound the ground. He will run under you and you should knock him into the fire.

name: 7-2 Bully the Bullies
notes: There is an island all the way across the level with 3 Bullies on it. Knock them all into the lava. A Big Bully will appear. Knock him in the lava for the star.

name: 7-3 8-Coin Puzzle with 15 Pieces
notes: Get all 8 Red Coins.

name: 7-4 Red-Hot Log Rolling
notes: In one corner of the level, there is a wire fence. Make your way over to it and use the spinning log to get on the island inside the fence. The star is there.

name: 7-5 Hot Foot-it into the Volcano
notes: Jump into the volcano in the center of the level. Make your way to the top by running and jumping along the side. The star is at the top.

name: 7-6 Inside the Volcano
notes: Jump into the volcano in the center of the level. Jump onto the moving platform and keep riding to the top.

name: 8-1 In the Talons of the Big Bird
notes: Punch or jump kick Klepto the Condor to get him to drop the star.

name: 8-2 Shining Atop the Pyramid
notes: In a crevice on the outside of the pyramid near the top. You can use the Wing Cap to get it or you can just climb up.

name: 8-3 Inside the Ancient Pyramid
notes: Inside the pyramid, all the way at the top.

name: 8-4 Stand Tall on the Four Pillars
notes: Outside the pyramid, climb up each of the 4 posts that you can walk up. Make sure that you touch the top of each one. After you touch all four, the top of the pyramid will open up. Fly into it, and a cage will bring you down to the red building in the center of the floor. Climb in and beat Eyerok by punching his eyes when they are visible.

name: 8-5 Free Flying for 8 Red Coins
notes: Get all 8 Red Coins.

name: 8-6 Pyramid Puzzle
notes: Get the 5 special gold coins inside the pyramid. Two of them are on the moving sand bridge, the other 3 are in the center of small square platforms up above the sand bridge.

name: 9-1 Board Bowser's Sub
notes: On the top of the submarine.

name: 9-2 Chests in the Current
notes: Swim all the way down when you start the level. There are 4 chests. Open them in this order (if you are at the tunnel looking at the whirlpool): chest on the left, chest on the right, chest in the back, and chest in the front (the one closest to the whirlpool).

name: 9-3 Pole-Jumping for Red Coins
notes: Get all 8 Red Coins.

name: 9-4 Through the Jet Stream
notes: The jet stream in the room with the submarine will send up rings of water. Swim down through 5 in a row. The star will appear on the ground inside the jet stream. Get the Metal Cap to get the star.

name: 9-5 The Manta Ray's Reward
notes: The manta ray will leave rings of water behind him. Swim through five in a row.

name: 9-6 Collect the Caps
notes: In the red gate in the water. Get the Vanish Cap, then the the Metal Cap. Jump down in the water and walk through the gate to get the star.

name: 10-1 Snowman's Big Head
notes: Climb up the mountain - jump above where the triangles are coming from, and walk along side of the large penguin to block the snowman's breath, or jump on top of the penguin's head and ride across. The star is at the top.

name: 10-2 Chill With the Bully
notes: Knock the Chill Bully off the platform for a star.

name: 10-3 In the Deep Freeze
notes: Get the star in the ice block maze near your starting point.

name: 10-4 Whirl from the Freezing Pond
notes: There are Spindrifts in the water near the ramp where the triangles come at you... jump on one and spin over to the platform. The left box has the star, the right box contains a turtle shell...

name: 10-5 Shell Shreddin' for Red Coins
notes: Get all 8 Red Coins.

name: 10-6 Into the Igloo
notes: Use the turtle shell to slide up the ramp with the 3 coins. Crawl into the igloo. Get the Vanish Cap and walk through the walls to get the star in the maze.

name: 11-1 Shocking Arrow Lifts!
notes: In the yellow box near the Arrow Lifts.

name: 11-2 Top o' the Town
notes: Across the wooden plank, in the yellow box on the highest floating island.

name: 11-3 Secrets in the Shallows & Sky
notes: Find all 5 secret spots. One is behind the block that you push at the very bottom of the level, one is in the yellow box that you can get by standing on the block that you push at the very bottom of the level, one is behind the block you push into a hole near one of the Chuckyas, one is in the yellow box above the cage with the star in it, and one is in the yellow box on top of the small island that the bomb is spinning around.

name: 11-4 Express Elevator - Hurry Up!
notes: In the cage up high. To get it, you need to lower the water level to the ground. Break the block at the bottom of the cage, climb up so you are on top of the cage with the star, and stand on the left half of the wooden platform. It will fall down. Jump off, run into the cage, and jump back on the platform before it goes up. Inside the cage.

name: 11-5 Go to Town for the Red Coins
notes: Get all 8 Red Coins. Use the cannon to launch yourself into the grate in the corner of the level. Swim into the other section of this stage.

name: 11-6 Quick Race Through Downtown!
notes: Use the cannon to launch yourself into the grate in the corner of the level, and swim to the other section of this stage. Use the Vanish Cap to get behind the grate near the corner of this section. There is another Vanish Cap inside the grate. Up top is the star. Use the ever-popular wall kick maneuver.

name: 12-1 Scale the Mountain
notes: At the very top of the mountain.

name: 12-2 Mystery of the Monkey Cage
notes: Catch Ukkiki the Monkey at the very top of the mountain (where Star 1 was) and follow him. He will open the cage with the star.

name: 12-3 Scary 'Shrooms, Red Coins
notes: Get all 8 Red Coins.

name: 12-4 Mysterious Mountainside
notes: Near the top of the mountain, there will be a wall about the same size as the entrance to Course 8 that you can jump through. When you get near the wall, it will shake. It leads to another slide. Survive the ride all the way to the end for a star.

name: 12-5 Breathtaking View from the Bridge
notes: Step on the ! switch near the top of the mountain. This will make a block appear in front of you, and one will appear in front of the waterfall. Go to the waterfall and jump on the block to get the star that is behind the water.

name: 12-6 Blast to the Lonely Mushroom
notes: Use the cannon to shoot yourself into the star that is sitting on top of the mushroom platform. The cannon is on a thin ledge beneath the ledge where the Monty Moles are. The Bob-omb Buddy is on a small ledge below where Ukkiki is.

name: 13-1 Pluck the Piranha Flower
notes: At the green pipe near the flat ! switch that makes a bridge out to the floating island. Make sure you are small. Kill the 5 Piranha Plants and you will get the star.

name: 13-2 The Tip Top of the Huge Island
notes: In a yellow box almost at the very top of the mountain. You need to be small to get this.

name: 13-3 Rematch with Koopa the Quick
notes: Just past the hole where the black balls roll out of, there is a Koopa the Quick, ready for a rematch. Be small and talk to him. Win the race and you will win a star.

name: 13-4 Five Itty Bitty Secrets
notes: Find all 5 secret spots. You have to be big. One is on the cannon, one is in the hole where the balls roll out of, one is the inside of the hole where small Mario can run through to get to the pool, one is in the pool at the very top of the mountain, and one is the the hole in the mountain at the edge of the wooden bridge above the water.

name: 13-5 Wiggler's Red Coins
notes: Be small. Launch yourself from the cannon at the tree. To find the Bob-omb Buddy, you need to be big and go to the place where the cannon is. When you catch the tree, climb down and walk across the wooden bridge and into the hole. Get all 8 Red Coins.

name: 13-6 Make Wiggler Squirm
notes: Be big. Climb to the pool at the very top of the mountain and pound the center. You will create a hole. Go down and turn small, climb back up, go down the hole, and beat Wiggler.

name: 14-1 Roll into the Cage
notes: Climb up along the normal path, and you will see the star within some grating. You can jump onto the platforms nearby and get it. Clock may be stopped or moving for this star - easier when stopped.

name: 14-2 The Pit and the Pendulums
notes: Climb up farther than star 1, and you will eventually come to a monster who will throw you up. Go past him and jump across the chasm. The star is just ahead. Clock may be stopped or moving for this star - easier when stopped.

name: 14-3 Get a Hand
notes: Stand on the clock hand that looks like an arrow and let it swing you around. When you see the star in front of you, jump onto the ledge and get it. Clock must be moving for this star.

name: 14-4 Stomp on the Thwomp
notes: Climb up to the very top of the stage. Swing around on the clock hand, and jump onto the Thwomp for the star. Clock must be moving for this star.

name: 14-5 Timed Jumps on Moving Bars
notes: Climb up higher than star 1, but not as high as star 4. You will see the star in a cage. You need to stand on top of the cage, then jump onto the platform that comes in and out of the wall to get the star.

name: 14-6 Stop Time for Red Coins
notes: Get all 8 Red Coins. Clock may be stopped or moving for this star - easier when stopped.

name: 15-1 Cruiser Crossing the Rainbow
notes: On one end of the pirate ship.

name: 15-2 The Big House in the Sky
notes: Ride the carpets up as high as you can go (you will pass through the castle in the sky twice). The star is on top of of the castle in the sky.

name: 15-3 Coins Amassed in a Maze
notes: Get all 8 Red Coins.

name: 15-4 Swingin' in the Breeze
notes: From the section where there are 4 spinning discs, go towards the tilting bridges and the platforms that swing back and forth. Go across one of the swinging platforms and you should see a flat ! switch on the ground near some triangular blocks. Step on it and the blocks will turn upside down so you can jump on them temporarily. Climb up them for the star.

name: 15-5 Tricky Triangles
notes: From the section where there are 4 spinning discs, go towards the tilting bridges and the platforms that swing back and forth. Climb up the steep wood slope, and go across the swinging platform to get the star.

name: 15-6 Somewhere over the Rainbow
notes: Launch yourself from the cannon so you catch the large pole coming from the island in the sky. Climb down and the star is in the yellow box. The cannon is on the opposite side of the pirate ship as star 1. To find the Bob-omb Buddy, you need to get on top of the building where all the Red Coins are, and jump down 1 ledge. The best way to get on top of the building where all the Red Coins are is to take the carpet near the 4 spinning discs, and then when it ends, take the carpet on the right. You will jump off it onto the falling wooden blocks, then jump back on it, then jump off it again onto the falling wooden blocks, then back onto it again. You should now be over the building, so you can get off the carpet. There is a yellow box on top of the building for reference.

name: Bowser in the Dark World 8 Red Coins
notes: Get all 8 red coins.

name: Bowser in the Fire Sea 8 Red Coins
notes: Get all 8 red coins.

name: Bowser in the Sky 8 Red Coins
notes: Get all 8 red coins.

name: Red ! Switch (Wing Cap) 8 Red Coins
notes: Get all 8 red coins.

name: Green ! Switch (Metal Cap) 8 Red Coins
notes: Get all 8 red coins.

name: Blue ! Switch (Vanish Cap) 8 Red Coins
notes: Get all 8 red coins.

name: Princess's Secret Slide (slow)
notes: Finish the race over 21 seconds.

name: Princess's Secret Slide (fast)
notes: Finish the race under 21 seconds.

name: The Secret Aquarium
notes: Get all 8 Red Coins.

name: Wing Mario over the Rainbow
notes: Get all 8 Red Coins.

name: Mips the Rabbit 1
notes: After you have 20 stars, catch the MIPS the Rabbit in the lower level of the castle where courses 6-8 are. He will give you a star.

name: Mips the Rabbit 2
notes: After you have 50 stars, catch MIPS the Rabbit again for another star.

name: Toad (Basement)
notes: After you have 20 stars, talk to Toad who is in the room where you enter Course 6. He will give you a star.

name: Toad (Upstairs)
notes: After you have 30 stars, in the upper level of the castle where Courses 10-13 are, Toad will give you a star if you talk to him.

name: Toad (Top Floor)
notes: After you have 50 stars, in the room with courses 14 and 15, talk to Toad, and he will give you a star.
